title.value: Особенности вегетации и периода покоя в годовом цикле развития деревьев сливы
Vegetation and dormant period peculiarities in the annual cycle of plum trees development

person.name: Matveev, V.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Fruit Growing
Poukh, E.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Brest Regional Agricultural Experimental Station

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of the observations of phenological stages of plum trees development and winter hardiness of 2004-2010 period. For the investigation there were taken 'Kubanskaya kometa' and 'Viktoriya' plum cultivars on 8 clonal and 7 seed rootstock types. Clonal rootstocks were: Julien A, Ackermann, Pixy, cerasifera Hamyra, Brompton, Marianna GF 8/1, G 5/22, GF 655/2. Seed rootstocks were: Julien INRA 2, Julien d'Orleans, Julien Noir, Brompton S, Wangenheims, Julien Wadenswill and Myrobalana. The seed rootstock Prunuscerasifera was used as the control. The planting scheme of trees was 5 x 3 m with planting density of 666 trees/hectare. There were not established influences of the studied rootstocks on the duration terms of the basic phenological stages at studied cultivars 'Kubanskaya kometa' and 'Viktoriya'. The most winter hardy variety and rootstock combinations were selected.
